name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,207 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 68,484 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 5,995 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 126 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
